p: Inevitably, taxonomic agreement to chemical datasets improves as the species diversity of the dataset is reduced. This is evident in the analysis in Figure 3, Figure 4, Figure 5 and Figure 6. Figure 3 includes all taxa with close affiliation to P. ovalifolia and P. rotundifolia, which are maaliol deficient high essential oil yielding specimens from section Prostanthera. Figure 4 gives a narrower analysis of species more closely related to P. ovalifolia using PCA. Figure 5 includes maaliol-rich species and the other taxa of the current study (excluding the data published elsewhere). In Figure 6, the maaliol-rich species are also analysed in PCA alongside the prostantherol-rich species and the P. rotundifolia complex.
